name: Planes Journey
description:
The battle between light and darkness has always existed, and this is only one aspect of this war.Humans have advanced and sophisticated equipment, and the undead have absolute superiority in numbers.Is it to join the human race and fight for survival?Or join the undead and perish for their own sake?
Game Features:
  • Uniquely upgraded system. Levels are divided into 10 levels from unranked civilian to 9 rank spirits. The development direction is warrior and mage.
  • elements system have a bright future, earth, wind, water, fire, six series, human side can have a bright future, the earth, wind, water, fire is one of the five elements, the undead side only attribute a dark, but the dead players initial call is in the hands of the undead, as the level of ascension, the undead call can summon more and stronger of the dead,Human players can only master summon phoenix at level 7 of fire and angel at level 8 of light.
  • The battle map of the game has 2 square kilometers, the human occupies the fertile land, the undead in the vast desert, there are endless Warcraft grassland in the middle, living some powerful Warcraft, so the player wants to break the local camp, not only to face the attack of hostile forces, but also to face the attack of Warcraft.
